item.title: Polycube
item.description: Polycube is an open source software framework that provides fast and lightweight network functions such as bridges, routers, firewalls, and others.

item.title: Polycube and gRPC
item.description: polycube-grpc-service-libraries allow the writing of a stand-alone Polycube service also in other languages.

item.title: Virgilium Editor
item.description: Virgilium Editor is the project of the System and Device Programming course of the year 2018/2019 from the Polytechnic of Turin.
